name: maplibre-gl-generic-geocoder
description: A geocoder control for Mapbox GL JS that uses your custom geocoding api

scripts.prepublish: NODE_ENV=production && mkdir -p dist && browserify --standalone MaplibreGenericGeocoder lib/index.js | uglifyjs -c -m > dist/maplibre-gl-generic-geocoder.min.js && cp lib/maplibre-gl-generic-geocoder.css dist/
